title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 16 April 2015 - XWiki
content:
<gsmeria> has quit  
00:38 <Pbas> has quit  
00:53 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki

01:38 <Denis> has quit

06:03 <Denis1> has quit  
06:25 <Chuguniy> has quit

08:04 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:11 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
08:42 <woshilapin> has quit  
09:01 <vmassol> good morning  
09:06 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:21 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
09:21 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
09:25 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:31 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:34 <Slashman> has quit  
09:37 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
09:49 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
09:53 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:06 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:21 <vmassol> Enygma`, evalica: cool to see you back. I hope you had some good holidays! :)  
10:25 <evalica> hi vmassol. Thanks :)  
10:38 <Enygma`> vmassol: Hi. Yep, thanks :)  
10:54 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
10:56 <Pbas> Hello, xwiki task force, do you know where I can found source of Page type property displayer (I want to fix an issue and improve it a bit)?  
10:57 <Pbas> maybe I must use simply "Custom Display" field...  
11:02 <vmassol> guys we need to release a 6.4.4 ASAP because of the blocker bug Denis2 has fixed yesterday  
11:04 <vmassol> 27 issues fixed for 6.4.4 already: http://jira.xwiki.org/issues/?filter=13794&jql=category%20in%20(%22Top%20Level%20Projects%22)%20AND%20fixVersion%20in%20(%226.4.4%22)%20AND%20resolution%20in%20(Fixed)  
11:04 <vmassol> Denis2: is your fix validated?  
11:05 <vmassol> (has it been verified that it fixes the problem, can we release 6.4.4 now?)  
11:05 <vmassol> ah just checked the roster and I'm the next one… http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/ReleaseManagerRoster ;)  
11:25 <Denis2> is now known as <Denis>  
11:26 <Denis> vmassol: Currently being tested, so far so good  
11:26 <Denis> I am waiting final confirmation to close the issue  
11:29 <Denis> I expect to have confirmation in the next 2 hours  
11:41 <vmassol> Denis: ok great, let me know so that I can start the release :)  
13:28 <vmassol> has quit  
13:38 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
13:42 <Denis> vmassol: you have the go for the release  
13:43 <vmassol> Denis: ok thanks  
13:48 <vmassol> guys there are 5 open issues with a fix for of 6.4.4: http://jira.xwiki.org/issues/?jql=Project%20in%20(%22XWiki%20Commons%22%2C%20%22XWiki%20Rendering%22%2C%20%22XWiki%20Platform%22%2C%20%22XWiki%20Enterprise%22)%20and%20fixVersion%20in%20(%226.4.4%22)%20and%20resolution%20in%20(%22Unresolved%22)  
13:49 <vmassol> Denis: there's an issue marked as a blocker : http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11968  
13:50 <vmassol> Denis: any idea about this issue? Is it related to your fix?  
14:02 <vmassol> moving to 6.4.5...  
14:09 <vmassol> hmm lots of test failure related to extensions on 6.4.x branch  
14:10 <vmassol> I wonder if this one is a real problem: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-wysiwyg-6.4.x/lastBuild/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-wysiwyg/testReport/org.xwiki.test.wysiwyg/LinkTest/testCreateLinkToNewPageInNewSpace/  
14:23 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
14:48 <msmeria> has quit  
14:59 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
15:00 <vmassol> hi mflorea :)  
15:01 <mflorea> hi vmassol  
15:02 <vmassol> mflorea: we need to release 6.4.4 ASAP. I can do it but i see that some tests are failing for the 6.4.x branch  
15:02 <vmassol> for extensions and WYSIWYG  
15:03 <vmassol> could you check quickly to see what this is about?  
15:41 <Slashman> has quit  
15:44 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
15:51 <vmassol> mflorea: ping  
15:51 <mflorea> vmassol: looking now (has to finish something first)  
15:51 <vmassol> ok thanks  
15:56 <mflorea> the wysiwyg failing test seems to be a regression. Let's see if it's still failing after the current build  
15:56 <mflorea> s/regression/flicker  
15:56 <mflorea> :)  
15:56 <vmassol> it's a pain to keep so many flickers for long period of time  
15:57 <vmassol> (referring to the extensions tests)  
15:57 <vmassol> (where there are 5-6 failing tests)  
15:59 <mflorea> yes, but I tried 2 times to fix them and I couldn't find the problem :(  
16:00 <vmassol> maybe pairing with someone could help find ideas to discover the problem and fix it  
16:00 <mflorea> btw, the wysiwyg tests are failing on master with  
16:01 <mflorea> Caused by: Failed to extract Entity Resource Reference from URL [http://localhost:8080/xwiki/resources/js/xwiki/wysiwyg/xwe/HTMLConverter.gwtrpc]  
16:01 <vmassol> I'd be ok to work with you to fix it (but not right now ;))  
16:01 <vmassol> ok thanks, checking  
16:02 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
16:02 <mflorea> best is probably to look at them with Thomas (for the extension tests)  
16:08 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
16:43 <mflorea> The failing extension tests are flickering too. There are two main issues: (1) Clicking on the "Continue" button with Selenium has no effect sometimes (very hard to reproduce) and (2) The extension is not found anymore in the repo after clicking on the Install/Uninstall/etc. button. I will try to make some time to investigate these tests again.  
16:44 <vmassol> mflorea: ok thanks  
16:44 <vmassol> should I continue with the release?  
16:44 <mflorea> +1 on my side  
16:44 <vmassol> ok  
16:47 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
17:36 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
18:00 <vmassol> grrr build failure on 6.4.x  
18:01 <vmassol> I don't understand why ci passed on platform for 6.4.x  
18:03 <vmassol> hmm was passing at http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform-6.4.x/  
18:03 <vmassol> oh I know  
18:03 <vmassol> that's bad actually  
18:04 <vmassol> Enygma`: is that you who removed the checkstyle from the main jobs?  
18:04 <vmassol> \*checkstyle checks  
18:04 <vmassol> I don't remember if it was thomas or you  
18:11 <Enygma`> vmassol: I don`t remember doing such thing  
18:11 <vmassol> then it must have been thomas

18:16 <Trefex> has quit

18:24 <MasterPiece> has joined #xwiki  
18:39 <woshilapin> has quit  
18:54 <gsmeria> has quit  
19:02 <vmassol> oh great…  
19:03 <vmassol> seems someone has fixed the agent build  
19:03 <vmassol> when building a bugfix release  
19:03 <vmassol> the pom seems to contain the correct version!  
19:03 <vmassol> let me check git history to see who did this  
19:03 <vmassol> :)  
19:03 <vmassol> seems http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleasePlans/ReleasePlanHelp#HBuildtherelease hasn't been updated though  
19:05 <vmassol> hmm I don't see anything  
19:09 <vmassol> has quit  
19:14 <MasterPiece> has quit  
19:23 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
19:24 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
19:24 <vmassol> ok found it  
19:24 <vmassol> done by thomas :)  
19:24 <vmassol> in rev ab6a3317a4a318bb07c546a8ee1e27e72102d6fc  
19:31 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
19:32 <gsmeria> has quit  
19:32 <tekzilla> hey, in a wiki article i have the text "(n)" with xwiki translates into a thumbs down icon, i tried escaping the parentheses with ~, but it doesnt seem to work  
19:40 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
19:41 <vmassol> tekzilla: you can use {{{(n)}}} in XWiki syntax 2.0+  
19:41 <vmassol> {{{…}}} is verbatim  
19:41 <vmassol> other option is to disable emoticons  
19:48 <cjd> has quit  
19:48 <tekzilla> vmassol: that did it, thanks!  
19:49 <vmassol> cool
